reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and flatters their curves, with one noting it gives the illusion of a smaller waist. The dress receives positive feedback for its look, quality, and stretchiness. The material quality receives mixed reviews - while some find it nice, others say it's very thin and cheap. The sizing is also mixed, with some saying it's true to size while others find it smaller than advertised. The color accuracy gets negative feedback, with customers reporting that the red dye bleeds and fades on skin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it
items.body: Sexyyyyy. Tight and right! Iâ€™m 300lbs but wanted a real sexy fit so I went with the XL. It did ALL it needed to do and MORE. I didnâ€™t have to wear a bra but chose to for a more lifted look although it looked equally good without! I got it for a dinner party and got so many compliments. This do not come with a zipper. Read more
items.author: Cherry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress, But Very Low-Cut for Bigger Busts
items.body: The GOBLES Womenâ€™s Deep V Neck Ruched Bodycon Midi Dress is absolutely stunning in person. The fabric is stretchy, smooth, and surprisingly flattering it really hugs the curves in all the right places. The ruching adds a nice shaping effect, and the midi length makes it feel both sexy and elegant at the same time. Itâ€™s definitely a head-turner for a night out or special event. My only issue is the neckline. It dips very low, and as someone who is big-busted, I found that I absolutely needed to wear a bra for support and coverage. Even then, the plunge shows more than Iâ€™m personally comfortable with. If youâ€™re larger up top or prefer a bit more modesty, you may need fashion tape, a plunge bra, or a little layering piece. Overall, I really love the look and feel of this dress itâ€™s just the fit in the chest that keeps it from being perfect for me. Still a beautiful piece if you like a bold, deep-V style. Read more
items.author: T M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect buy

items.body: Cute dress just not a fan of the huge shoulder pads Not really small boob friendly If your bottom heavy it many not line up right I ordered a large so the bottom was fitted but the top was too loose The length stopped at my knees Maybe with a little alternating itâ€™ll work 5â€™7 220 38c for reference Read more

items.author: Wanda Mc Eachern

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pink Color is Inaccurate and Dress is Very See-Through
items.body: I normally donâ€™t write negative reviews, but I feel that I should based on the item I received. Unfortunately, I will have return this dress for two reasons. The first reason being the color. I picked the light pink dress, hoping it would be a soft pink color. However, after opening it, itâ€™s much more of a vivid pink than the picture showed on the listing (itâ€™s like the color of Pepto Bismol). The second, and more important reason, is that the dress is completely see through. The fabric is extremely thin and was visibly sheer after trying it on. Thereâ€™s nothing I could wear underneath to hide the sheerness without it being painfully obvious. I will say, a plus of this dress is that the fit was pretty nice, and Iâ€™m not sure if the transparent fabric is only an issue with lighter color fabrics. Overall, I will be returning this item as I was really looking forward for a cute pink dress for Valentineâ€™s Day only to be disappointed in the end. Read more
items.author: Natalia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: I loved this dress and I got plenty of compliments in it. Complimented my curves just right. Read more

items.author: Queen K

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Bodycon V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Ruched Bodycon V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Red, Wine Red, Pink, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
